name: Tiki Masala
instructions: Marinate the chicken with some oil, salt, and pepper.
Hammer the chicken to make it more tender.
Start cooking on a skillet. Couple minutes each side.
Once chicken is done, set it aside to rest for a few minutes.
Dice up the chicken into little squares once it has cooled a bit.
Add chicken back into pan and pour the tiki masala sauce on top.
Turn up the heat and add a lid. Let the sauce simmer for a minute or two to make sure the chicken is totally cooked.
Add in the rice once it is done and stir to complete.
